headings.usage: Use for all H1-H3. Tight tracking (-0.02em). Elegant and editorial.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs and UI elements. High legibility.

mono.usage: Use for traceability data, technical specs, and small labels.

grid_system.process_timeline: flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-8 overflow-x-auto snap-x

buttons.primary: bg-[#1A3C34] text-white hover:bg-[#152F29] rounded-none px-8 py-4 font-medium tracking-wide transition-all shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#C06E52] hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-none
buttons.secondary: border border-[#1A3C34] text-[#1A3C34] hover:bg-[#1A3C34] hover:text-white rounded-none px-8 py-4 transition-all uppercase text-sm tracking-widest

cards.feature: bg-white border border-[#E5E0D8] p-8 hover:border-[#1A3C34] transition-colors duration-300 group
cards.stat: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-6 border-r border-[#E5E0D8] last:border-0

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b border-[#1A3C34] rounded-none px-0 py-4 focus:ring-0 focus:border-[#C06E52] placeholder:text-[#1A3C34]/50 transition-colors

badges.trust: inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 bg-[#4A6C45]/10 text-[#4A6C45] text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-full border border-[#4A6C45]/20

hero.content: Full screen height. Dark overlay. Big bold serif headline. Primary CTA 'Solicitar presupuesto'.

about.title: Quiénes Somos / Who We Are
about.style: Split screen. Text left, image right. Focus on 'Security' and 'Trust'.

processes.title: Nuestros Procesos / Our Processes
processes.style: Horizontal timeline with icons or numbered steps. Use 'Space Mono' for step numbers.

essence_values.title: Nuestra Esencia & Valores / Essence & Values
essence_values.style: Grid of 3 cards. Minimal icons. Hover effect reveals details.

varieties.title: Nuestras Variedades / Our Varieties
varieties.style: Bento grid. High-quality close-ups of beans/pods.

services.title: Nuestros Servicios / Our Services
services.style: List layout with large typography and distinctive separators.

sustainability.title: Sostenibilidad / Sustainability
sustainability.style: Green background section (#1A3C34 text on #E2E8E4 bg). Impact metrics.

gallery.title: Galería / Gallery
gallery.style: Masonry grid with lightbox support. Mix of landscape and portrait.

contact.title: Contacto / Contact
contact.style: Simple form. 'Solicitar Presupuesto'. Map background optional.

footer.style: Dark bg (#1A3C34). White text. Large logo. Language toggle.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (Menu, Chevron, Search). Use 'phosphor-react' (thin weight) for feature icons.

motion.reveal: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.6, ease: 'easeOut' }} viewport={{ once: true }}
motion.stagger: initial='hidden' whileInView='visible' viewport={{ once: true }} variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Playfair Display' from Google Fonts for headings.
Use 'Manrope' from Google Fonts for body text.
Use 'Space Mono' from Google Fonts for data/specs.
Create a 'LanguageContext' to handle ES/EN toggling globally.
Ensure the 'Contact' form has a distinct 'Solicitar presupuesto' mode.
Implement the 'Sustainability' section with a distinct background color (#E2E8E4) to break the flow.
For the Gallery, use a simple grid that opens a Modal/Dialog with the full image.
Use the provided image URLs strictly. Do not use placeholders.
IMPORTANT: The 'Process' section must clearly show the steps: Produce -> Transport -> Distribute.
Ensure 'Security and Trust' is conveyed through the deep green color (#1A3C34) and clean, structured layout.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
